actions.description:
accepts the following parameters:

name:		string to search
contains:	search by contents rather than by name

kind:		filter by file kind. For further details, do 'srch kind'
kindx:		like regular 'kind', but allows you to match by regex pattern, instead
kindz:		pass in a list of file types seperated by a comma (no space), included in quotes like: 'css,html,js'

only:		'true', short for 'file only', shows just the files; no lines
hidden:		'true' to include hidden files
h:		'true', shortened version of 'hidden'
dir:		directory to search; leave the directory off to search current directory
log:		creates a search log file (full path to file required)
